title: AntKB
author: AntKB
content: Hi, For sale is my authenticated watch which I took to a nationwide luxury assets pawn broker in Birmingham, UK. I own a Richard Mille RMO11, it has paperwork from the luxury assets company describing my visit to their company and its high value. I can't post pictures here due to my phone. However, I'm more than happy to offer pictures via dm later Also, I'm looking £210,000.00 ono. It retails at  £335,858.00. Ask for details. Thank you. Potentially will to offer escrow.

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: AntKB on November 07, 2023, 12:43:40 PMI can't post pictures here due to my phone. However, I'm more than happy to offer pictures via dm later Also,I'm not sure if I'm missing something, but how come you were able to post pictures in your previous threads (what changed)? If you can provide it later, then you can also do it now!Quote from: AntKB on November 07, 2023, 12:43:40 PMI own a Richard Mille RMO11If you ever decide to post its pictures, make sure to also include a handwritten note that contains your name and the date [e.g. in a way that clearly shows the watch as well].
